abstract: HSBC Holdings, Europe’s biggest bank, may have to raise as much as $30 billion in capital and halve its dividend as earnings are likely to deteriorate more than expected, Morgan Stanley analysts said on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: HSBC Holdings, Europe’s biggest bank, may have to raise as much as $30 billion in capital and halve its dividend as earnings are likely to deteriorate more than expected, Morgan Stanley analysts said on Tuesday.

headline.main: HSBC May Need $30 Billion, Analysts Say
